data.name: Line Dance Virtual
data.detailed_description:
Line Dance Virtual teaches you party dancing using virtual reality. Learn the fundamental movements of line dances, including the most popular party, retro and wedding hits, like:

  • Shuffid Cuple
  • Electric Glide
  • Souldier Boy
  • Scoot Bootin Boogie
  • Bronzehead Road
  • Loosefoot
  • Woogle

You can now learn from home and join the dance party outside it! Compare to your local dance studio and you'll realize you will save a ton of time and money (and heartbreak) while starting your new and legendary hobby.

Our professional teachers will explain how movements translate from your virtual to a real world experience. Pause. Slow down. Rewind. Practice. With a level dedicated to dance fundamentals, even those of us with two left feet can learn to check our balance, and get used to dancing in VR, so we can eventually do it in the real world.. and have fun!

data.short_description: Line Dance Virtual teaches you line dances with virtual reality. Learn the basics in the comfort and convenience of your own home, and be ready to hit the floor dancing when you try it in the real world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
